outline:
1. (Hiphil) to smell, scent, perceive odour, accept
    1. of horse
    2. of delight (metaph)
kjv_def: accept, smell, [idiom] touch, make of quick understanding.
strongs_def: properly, to blow, i.e. breathe; only (literally) to smell or (by implication, perceive (figuratively, to anticipate, enjoy)
